values: Glorious Together: Six Steps for Abounding in HopeGlorious Together: Six Steps for Abounding in Hope

Hope produces joy and peace, and as we patiently endure tribulation by the power of the Holy Spirit, hope feeds on its own fruit and abounds all the more.
